music.title: Ether Diver
music.myDescription: Ether Diver's blog includes the very cool "Other People's Music" series, which reviews and promotes independent music from around the web.

music.title: Kristoffer Lislegaard
music.description: Kristoffer Lislegaard is a Norwegian experimental ambient musician and producer based in Oslo. Since 2010, he has created, performed and released music as a solo artist as well as in various duo and ensemble formats, combining genres such as ambient, noise, post-rock, club music and more. He has also composed and sound designed contemporary dance, theatre, film, art installations, poetry and performance art.

music.title: Paloma Kop
music.description: I am an experimental multimedia artist and creative technologist currently based in New Haven, CT. My practice incorporates electronic media, from analog video and synthesizers to digital systems and code, as well as various physical materials and processes. I am especially interested in feedback loops, recursion, self-organizing and emergent structures, patterns in nature, psychedelia, and embodied sensory experience.

indieweb.title: Tracy Durnell's Mind Garden
indieweb.description: I‚Äôm a sci-fi writer, graphic designer and urbanist in the Seattle suburbs. Reading and blogging are my favorite pasttimes and I‚Äôm an advocate of the indie web. I‚Äôm curious about everything from technology to history to ecology. I use this website to: track what I read and watch, write commentary on things that interest me, and     save reference information.
